channel.title: -ActivationX 718-
channel.description:
[center][b]ActivationX[/b] is a brand new server,we try to give you the best content!
[b]Why join us?[/b]
We are brand new server with amazing content. We care about our community and take in all feedback both towards the game and ourselves. We listen to the community and we give them exactly what they want. The hosting is very secure and allows us to ensure you of 99.9% uptime with 100% lag-free gameplay. High quality staff team. Daily Updates!
We aren't like any other RSPS's where we simply take a source and run it; we have built this server from the ground and we're extremely proud of what we have achieved, You won't regret joining. So, What are you waiting for?
[b]Server features:[/b]
-Easy ways to make money- -16+ Bosses- -PVM- -100% Godwars- -Nex- -Tormented Demons- -Corpreal beast- -KBD- -QKB- -Bork- -Blink- -Sunfreet- -8+Minigames- -Real Warriors guild!- -Fight caves 63 Waves 100%- -Fight Ciln 36 Waves 100%- -Runespan 100%- -Dominion Tower 100%- -All 25 skills are trainable!- -Hunter- -Construction with player owned house!!- -Runecrafting- -Farming- -Lavaflow- -160 CUSTOM ITEMS!- -Drygores- -Colored items- -Squeal of Fortune 100%- -Money pouch work 100%- -Dicing- - 24/7 uptime ´´Lag free´´- -And much more!-
[b]Custom items.[/b] All custom items are working and with stats!
-All Drygores with off-hands- -Ascension Crossbow + Off-hand- -Boogie bow- -Tetsu armour- -Malevolent armour- -Sirenic armour- -Tectonic armour- -Death lotus armour- -Flame whip- -Razor whip- -Brutal whip- -Demonic wings- -Angelic wings- -Chaotic claws- -Shark Fists- -9 New party hat colours- -9 New H'ween masks colours- -11 New party hat colours- -120 Capes ( 200M XP)- -5B XP cape- -All Tok-Haar cape colours ( Red,Green,BLue )- -Fishing outfit from Fish Flingers-
And much more! Feel free and join us![/center]

item.title: -ActivationX 718-
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

For the love of God, how is dicing a feature on a 718 server? If any server 474+ does not have dicing in the game, then they are a terrible server. It shouldn’t even have to be mentioned because it is so obvious… Same goes with farming, runecrafting, lag free, hunter, mentioning having “colored items” and also stating you have “160 customs”. It is actually laughable that you can even consider these as features on a server like yours. It also shows me that you don’t really have any proper features to display.

Seriously, it is just sloppy. Where is the media too?

server with amazing content.

From looking at your thread. You most certainly do not.

Read full topic
